executives.name: Donald Goldman
executives.customer_note: Donald Goldman is listed as the business owner for Happy Travels, LLC.

evidence.value: Donald Goldman is listed as the business owner for Happy Travels, LLC on their cannabis license.

products: Cannabis Concentrates (Shatter, Cake Badder, Sugar Wax, Terp Sauce)

website_info.summary: Happy Travels is a cannabis manufacturing company located in San Diego, California that produces high-quality cannabis products. They are the exclusive provider of Vapen branded products in California.
website_info.infomration_about_the_team: The company is owned by Donald Goldman, but I was unable to find any additional information about other company executives or decision makers.
